formatted_address: 1 Hon Sui Sen Dr Level 2, NUS, Hon Sui Sen Memorial Library, Singapore 117588
name: TOMORO COFFEE

reviews.text:
Very inconsistent standard. I order 2 cups one for in morning and another in the afternoon, both with less ice. The hojicha latte has significantly much lesser volume compared to the coffee. When questioned, the staff just snapped back, ‚Äúit is less ice‚Äù. Despite asking for less ice, the amount of ice is still almost a full cup (refer to the blue arrow). And the ice in my coffee was lesser with way more drink, versus the hojicha latte with super alot of ice and way lesser drink.

I finished the hojicha very quickly as it is mostly ice, and found it super expensive for this amount of actual drink. Not worth it at all.
There‚Äôs way too much ice‚ÄîI can‚Äôt stand it. If you order a large, the actual drink volume is the same as a regular because they just add more ice.

Only got a coffee which was nice~
Brezel looks interesting, aim to try~
the muffin is chocolate chip blueberry muffin very nice , suggest you guys order and give a try, if you are not used to drink Americano but wanted to try it out, can order the pomelo Americano.

Hi tomoro , I just had chocolate n chicken wrap at your place just now around 10am. After I get back home, feel like my stomach not feeling well and had diarrhoea. I m in my 3rd trimester of pregnancy and going to deliver at nuh very soon. I do not wish the food there to be u hygienic. Can see from the display there‚Äôs a lot of wrap prep ahead of time and I wonder how long does the wrap are on shelves. Please keep your food fresh as possible because most likely people having your food there are sick people or pregnant women like me. üôè

vicinity: 1 Hon Sui Sen Dr Level 2, NUS, Hon Sui Sen Memorial Library
